sentences: Olete öelnud, et ei tule homme.
Kas te olete öelnud seda juba?
context: "Ütlesite" is the past tense, plural form of the Estonian verb "ütlema" which means "to say" or "to tell". It specifically refers to what multiple people said in the past. The word breaks down as: ütle- (root meaning "say") + -site (past tense, plural ending). This is commonly used when addressing a group of people who spoke previously.
